page.title: 16THE KING'S ARMS, OTTERTON
page.content: There is 1 public house in this block,called{The Kings Arms,}situated} in the main street of{Otterton.}The Devonish Brewery owns the pub. Mrs Seager rents it. The{Devonish Brewery supply the beer and Mrs Seager sells almost every drink. The favourite drink is lager. There is a head stone with the date on it but we can not make it out. You have to be 18 to buy drinks. The opening and closing times are 10.30am to 2.30pm and from 5.30pm to 11.00pm. She employs 3 people. There is a big difference between her trade in summer and winter. There are darts, cards,euchre a juke box to play or fruit machines. 3 rooms are open to the public as well as a childrens room. Smoking is allowed in the pub. She does not show videos to the public. She has not had any serious violence by drunken people.
